item.title: How To Set Up a New Mac
item.author: Author
item.description: Hello Mac :) Having just finished setting up my Mac for a second time in as many months, I thought it would be a good time to capture what I’ve done to make this process a little easier the next time I’m inevitably going to do it. You could argue that a better title for this post is “How I Set Up New Mac” since its usefulness is most likely limited to my future self, but I didn’t have a “How I” category on this site…
